name: Staryu
flavorText: An enigmatic Pokemon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

strengths: Exceptional 20 damage for 1 Water Energy is highly efficient
Can attack effectively from the first turn with proper Energy
Evolves into Starmie which has healing and disruption capabilities
Low retreat cost of 1 provides excellent mobility
Strong against Fire-type Pokemon in the format
weaknesses: Low 40 HP makes it vulnerable to one-hit knockouts
Lightning weakness is problematic against popular Electric Pokemon
Only one attack limits strategic flexibility
No resistance to help offset defensive weaknesses
Cannot sustain prolonged battles due to low HP
synergies: PlusPower boosts Slap to 30 damage for guaranteed KOs on many basics
Evolve into Starmie to access healing and continue momentum
Energy Removal can slow opponents while Staryu applies pressure
Gust of Wind brings out weak benched Pokemon that Staryu can knock out
counters: Pikachu - Lightning weakness means Thunder Jolt is devastating
Magnemite - Electric typing exploits weakness significantly
Grass Pokemon - Can retaliate effectively against Staryu
